objectClass.name: Logistical data
objectClass.description: detailed compilation of logistical capacities of operational area

simpleProperty.name: Name of logistical set
simpleProperty.description: Recognisable name of certain logistical set to conduct the flood defence system

simpleProperty.name: Disposable Staff
simpleProperty.description: disposable number of people for setup of the defence system

simpleProperty.name: Disposable means of transport
simpleProperty.description: disposable number of means of transport for hauling components between storage site and defence line

vectorSet.name: Disposable transport volume
vectorSet.description: Data set to describe each typ of means of transport regarding volume and necesarry staff

simpleProperty.name: Typical loading volume
simpleProperty.description: Loading volumen of one type of means of transport

simpleProperty.name: Number of means of transport
simpleProperty.description: Number of means of transport of one typ

simpleProperty.name: Staff per vehicle
simpleProperty.description: nummber of people needed to operate one transport vehicle

simpleProperty.name: Additional staff per vehicle fpr loading
simpleProperty.description: number of peole needed in addition to \"Staff per vehicle\" for loading / unloading on vehicle of this type

simpleProperty.name: Specifi loading time
simpleProperty.description: Time neede to load / unload the parts of the FPS [h/m3]

simpleProperty.name: Parallel loading
simpleProperty.description: Numer of vehicles to be loaded at the same time

objectClass.name: Storage data
objectClass.description: describing the capacities of the storage site

simpleProperty.name: Distance of transportation
simpleProperty.description: Distance between storage site and defence site, road length

simpleProperty.name: Transportation time
simpleProperty.description: Driving time of transport vehicles between loading site and defence line
